website_summaries.verdict: A good-quality center channel speaker, especially if you're looking for something that won't take up a ton of space.
pros: Features a curved cabinet design for better sound quality
Comes with two 4” structured surface woofers
cons: Doesn't have the same power as more expensive speakers, but still a great speaker for most setups

customer_reviews.title: one of the best speakers for the money
customer_reviews.text: having had this in two different homes with totally different acoustic signatures I can say that this speaker really helps to just fill a room with sound. I did buy this off a black Friday deal a few years back for I believe 89 dollars and this was the best money I ever spent towards my surround sound. the tones are very bright and vibrant and just a very pleasing sound I would highly recommend this for anyone looking to get into a center channel speaker for their surround sound
customer_reviews.author: Hopper55

customer_reviews.title: Awesome yet large
customer_reviews.text: Amazing center speaker. I actually have the complete Andrew Jones set and love it. I can't say enough about the power and clarity at all levels of these speakers. The center speaker is much larger than I anticipated. Also the bottom of the speaker is rounded and you are given to rubber stabilizing pads so it doesn't move. I wish they would have just made the bottom flat. The extra space from the pads is nearly too much to fit it where I needed to. Still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Movie dialogue become crystal clear having this speaker on Central channel!
customer_reviews.text: There was a time when no one had even heard of a center channel. I remember those days. With surround sound and a center channel, much of your dialog will be played through here. This Pioneer speaker is well designed and easy to install, it offers great value for If you are building a budget surround sound system. The Movie experience is significantly improved having dialogues channels through this speaker. For me I no longer need to have subtitles all the time in order to follow the dialogue — it’s crystal clear through this speaker. For music playback and other content that doesn’t support 5.1 system, there is no noticeable difference with a 2.1 system.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound for your dollar!
customer_reviews.text: Bought the tower, bookshelf (for surrounds) and the 8" powered sub first. Had an old Pioneer center channel speaker and thought I could get away with using it. I could hear almost immediately that it couldn't hang. I bit the bullet and bought this center channel speaker. It is like night and day! The vocals are crystal clear and all sound effects are right there. Movies and TV sound super. Very happy with my choice of these Pioneer speakers.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jerew

customer_reviews.title: Well built, affordable, great sound!!
customer_reviews.text: I had the bookshelf speakers a good 8 years ago and they were an amazing pair of budget speakers. When looking for a center speaker for my current set up (B&W DM602s) I wanted something budget friendly again and this one fit the bill. And because I had a good experience with the bookshelf speakers by Pioneer (Andrew Jones ones) it was a no brainer. Hooked it up and sounds great! I didn’t realize how big it was and kinda worried it won’t fit my current set up logistically but I managed to make it work. Definitely check these out. Pairs nicely with my B&Ws. Might have to get the bookshelf speakers to use as surrounds.
customer_reviews.author: N. H.

customer_reviews.title: for the money its worth it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a few months ago and was not that impressed. Especially after comparing the Polk T30 which I purchased for my bedroom. Later I swapped out the two because the Polk T30 was much cleaner and louder so I decided to use that in the living room. With the pioneer, it was necessary to turn my center channel up to over 75% of power while the rest of the channels were at around 25%. With the polk t30 I had to turn it down quite a lot. I think between the two the polk has by far higher quality sound at about the same price point. With that said, for the money the Pioneer performs well enough.
customer_reviews.author: N. Sizemore

customer_reviews.title: It is a drastic improvement over what I had.
customer_reviews.text: Back in my younger days, I was more into audio quality that my budget allowed for as I got older. Now I have a few more bucks I can afford better things. I really like this center channel speaker. This is not meant for low grade electronics. I am using a Pioneer VSX-932 to drive this speaker, and it works wonderfully. I don't have any comparisons with other like items so I can't help there. I can say that I am happy with this speaker and will look to get a pair of SP-BS22LR speakers to go with itin the very near future.
customer_reviews.author: RockledgeWoodDog

customer_reviews.title: Definitely not an upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: This was to up grade a center speaker that was a part of10 yr old speaker surround system that was included with old only system. 10 yr old plus. I expected to be blown away. I tried to like it. Turn up speaker volume to near max. Sound was low, muffled sounded like the television with no speakers. Plugged my old one back up and now it sounds incredible compared to the one I just bought
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds really good. I have a small living room and I have no complaints regarding the sound quality of this speaker. NOTE: Please do not place this speaker inside a cabinet as it needs some open space to breathe. I struggled with muddy dialogues for over a year even after trying almost every hack. I moved the speaker on top of the TV and I have not faced any issues with the dialogues ever since. I do set the level of this speaker at +2db higher than my FS22 LR speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Dark Knight

customer_reviews.title: Bargain high fidelity
customer_reviews.text: I love the pioneer/Andrew Jones speaker line. They can handle high output with no distortion. The soundstage is open, warm and accurate. The build and sound is worth much more than the price might indicate. I did a lot of research and trials before deciding on this system. My only disappointment was this center channel speaker would not fit in my new TV stand. I returned it without any problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I should of bought this sooner
customer_reviews.text: I've just had the stereo setup in this same line for 8 years. I didn't realize what I was missing not having the center channel. Only little annoying thing is it has these rubber stops you put underneath to keep it pointed in the correct direction. Because I have kids they always seem to go missing. I might just glue em to the bottom once I find the missing. What I'm trying to say is maybe think twice before you have kids.
customer_reviews.author: iworkforaliving

customer_reviews.title: Going from a small Yamaha speaker that came with my ...
customer_reviews.text: Going from a small Yamaha speaker that came with my receiver to this pioneer, the comparison is night and day. I get a much broader frequency range making this sound much fuller than what I had before. I had problems hearing the dialogue with the old Yamaha. Now that is not a issue. Be advised that the speaker is much bigger, and I had to build a small stand for it to sit on. It couldn't sit on top of the TV stand in front of it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: asilversurfer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Box was delivered with huge holes on it and taped over. Thankfully, nothing damaged. I did run the AV receiver sound calibration which said the polarity was backward. I ran this test 3 times and same thing. I double checked the wiring. When I switched the polarity, no error. When I have time, I might open it up to see if I can check it. Sound quality is very good, especially for the money.
customer_reviews.author: TobycW

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it but it could definitely sound a bit better
customer_reviews.text: Depending on your source material, sounds sort of veiled. But I have an all Pioneer Andrew Jones setup so I had to match. May investigate the crossover upgrade someday. Wanted to love it but it could definitely sound a bit better. I've got Polk RTI's in my HT and the CSI5 center which obviously sounds better. Regardless, I'll give this 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Value, Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I purchased to upgrade my small Polk TL1 center channel. The Polk was very compact and easier to place but this Pioneer speaker, though only 20 bucks more expensive than the Polk, represents a fairly significant upgrade in sound quality. This Pioneer speaker is large. If you have an entertainment center with various open "cubbies," this will take up an entire cubbie. Do not expect to be able to place this on top of your entertainment center unless you've hung your tv on the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Brent Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Nice center channel in 7.1 system~!
customer_reviews.text: Paired with 7 Focal (5 sib/cub and 2 XL) for a 7.1 surround system. Wanted Andrew Jones but did not have the space for the larger new company direct version, found this. Though likely not as great, it does sound really good, natural voices and plenty of full sound, efficient as well!
customer_reviews.author: Holograman

customer_reviews.title: only had it a few weeks no issues yet. ...
customer_reviews.text: only had it a few weeks no issues yet. it us rather large. in the attached photo you see it sitting on the table in front of a 40in display, which needed to be raised up to have the bottom to the screen visible.
customer_reviews.author: Kenobi

customer_reviews.title: Don't usually leave reviews but felt I needed to as ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually leave reviews, but felt I needed to, as I was on the fence about getting the SP C22 due to its size. Yes it is large, but it sounds GREAT. It has a much fuller and richer sound than the Micca center speaker that I initially ordered from Amazon. If you have other speakers from the Andrew Jones series but are on the fence about getting this center due to its size, I would strongly recommend going for it and doing what you need to make room for it in your setup.
customer_reviews.author: irishfan23

customer_reviews.title: A Surprisingly Effective Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Using the system for which this unit was purchased almost exclusively for movie sound, I was looking for a stronger clearer delivery of the dialogue, which is mostly found in the center channel. I had previously been using another speaker, of a similar size, manufactured by a very reputable company. As this unit was so affordably priced, I would have been grateful for a marginal improvement. This speaker was radically better than its predecessor. The dialogue sounded strong, clear, and crisp, with superb intelligibility. This was a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Greene

customer_reviews.title: I only got this as a temporary fix, but...
customer_reviews.text: I actually bought this as a temporary solution since my center speaker broke. I actually plan to do a major upgrade but just didn't have enough time to do it. I'm really happy with how this sounds and I feel less pressed to do my major upgrade. That's all I can say. I feel like I have time to do the upgrade properly now and to save a little extra money..
customer_reviews.author: T'challa

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer center SP C22
customer_reviews.text: The reason for a 4 star rating is only because I know you can get a better sound but for twice or 3 times the cost. Paired with pioneer SP FS52 and a Sony STR DH520 for a 3.0 set up. The improvement is great for vocals etc. I would have no problem recommending this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I underestimated the contribution this speaker would make to my 7.1 onkyo wound system. Good sound quality. Clean clear voices. Nice. The speaker is bigger than I expected but has nice little touches. It even comes with 2 small rubber spacers to keep vibration down and the speaker from moving around on the table. I can't compare it to much more, since I have limited experience with other center speakers. This is replacing an older infinity center channel. It has better sound and more presents in the sound output. I am very happy with the speaker and the price.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: The first time dialogue came through this speaker in my ...
customer_reviews.text: The first time dialogue came through this speaker in my house, my dog barked from upstairs and ran down thinking someone else was in the house with me.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Ford

customer_reviews.title: Solid speaker/Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the Pioneer VSX-832 receiver, these Andrew Jones towers, the Andrew Jones Center and Rear speakers and added the Yamaha YST-SW315 subwoofer. Wired with 14 gauge wiring, sub with a single RCA, audio comes in from the TV with an HDMI. These speakers want at least 100watts, and this setup delivers a sufficient 165watts at 6ohms. This setup has more than delivered on its value, you won’t find better speakers at this price point, just make sure that you are not under powering them.
customer_reviews.author: BRANDON MCLAUGHLIN

customer_reviews.title: Home theater done right...
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what an improvement over my old "home theater in a box" setup from Sony. True, setting up a home theater by buying individual speakers and pairing them with a receiver/amplifier is a lot more work, but the end-result is truly fantastic sound. The transformation is almost unbelievable. I bought all of the Pioneer Andrew Jones designed speakers for a 5.1 setup, matched to a Denon AVR S510 receiver, and I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: C. Bender

customer_reviews.title: Great Center Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This center speaker matches very well with the SP-FS52's. I would highly recommend it. Some have said that the sound is a bit "muddy," but if you set the crossover right they really sound perfect in movies and shows. You'll get great dialog at any level. I would highly recommend it, especially if you have the matching Andrew Jones Pioneer Front-Standing or Bookshelf Speakers to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Excellent center channel for the money
customer_reviews.text: This center channel was a HUGE upgrade over the 20 year old sony I had been using. The sound quality is great, dialogue is crisp, loud and clear. In the end I gave my brother this center because I upgraded to a full Klipsch system, but for the money you can't beat this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Best center channel speaker for the money
customer_reviews.text: Best center channel speaker for the money. When you pick them up and feel the weight and construction you know you are in for a great center channel sound for your surround system. Pass on the MICCA, Andrew Jones for few dollars more. They look great and will sound better as you break them in.
customer_reviews.author: KenCitadel

customer_reviews.title: Quality at affordable price
customer_reviews.text: For the price it's amazing and matches perfectly with the sp-fs52..... buy 2 sp-fs52 and one of these center chanells....and it's a cheap excellent setup....throw in some decent surrounds and a subwoofer and you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: deth jennings

customer_reviews.title: What a great sounding speaker
customer_reviews.text: What a great sounding speaker.. I have this connected to my Denon surround sound system and the quality is very natural. This is a heavy wooden box so that and the quality speakers inside produce a great center speaker sound. Love the affordable price... Great purchase!!.
customer_reviews.author: D.O.Gee

customer_reviews.title: Essential in my home theater set up
customer_reviews.text: Love it, it is essential to my set up. Even though the speaker diameter is smaller than the towers it still performs flawlessly. I would say it really enhances the dialog experience when watching a movie. The whole set of AJ designed speakers really are on point and are in my opinion the best quality for the best price.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: A decent home theater system for 300.00
customer_reviews.text: Andrew jones what can I say.These are the best 50 dollar speakers I've ever heard how can they do it? Their only fault is their low sensitivity (84db1w1m) so you have to feed them more power than you normally would so heat may be a problem if you like your sounds loud. I'm using fans to keep my pioneer receiver cool but they sound phenomenal. At 49 dollars they are a no brainer
customer_reviews.author: E.O.

customer_reviews.title: Andrew Jones is the bomb!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was bigger than I realized, paired with the Floor Standing model (same series) for the front channel and the bookshelf model (same series) for the rear using a Pioneer Elite Receiver and I was floored at the sound compared to my old speakers!
customer_reviews.author: TheElderGodFather

customer_reviews.title: These speakers sound great in my large open living room
customer_reviews.text: These speakers sound great in my large open living room. I bought the sub, four bookshelf speakers, and center speaker and use a Sony DH750 receiver with them. The speakers look good in the room, and sound even better. After breaking them in and calibrating them for the room, I get great surround sound for music and movies. Great balance with bass and treble. I would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B

customer_reviews.title: Really Big!
customer_reviews.text: This is actually much larger (And heavier than I though). Sound is fine. But I can't really tell if it's actually better than that little speaker I had before...
customer_reviews.author: Antoine Guilbaud

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic center speaker
customer_reviews.text: I bought both the Pioneer SP-C22 and a pair of SP-FS52 was very disappointed with the FS-52's BUT the SP-C22 was great right out of the box and got better after break in. Very clear and clean sounding. The only thing I didn't like was the black finish would be nice if offered in walnut. I would highly recommend this center speaker.
customer_reviews.author: RJB

customer_reviews.title: Truly can't beat these speakers for the price; I ...
customer_reviews.text: Truly can't beat these speakers for the price; I got the whole setup including the Atmos enabled speakers (which I wasn't impressed with, as far as providing a true Atmos experience)
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great center channel speaker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our entertainment center and paired it with a Yamaha RX-V679BL AV receiver. It sounds excellent for all purposes, whether we're listening to music, watching TV or movies, or playing video games. Great value! Much better than the smaller center speaker it replaced. Dialog is especially improved for 5.1 channel feeds.
customer_reviews.author: David T. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Although I had to send this speaker back to Amazon (it was to big for my application) it sounded great and looked fantastic. Amazon made the return procedure simple. The speaker housing was an 1/2 inch to long, my mistake, I should have measured before buying.
customer_reviews.author: James Duszynski

customer_reviews.title: High Quality for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Pioneer didn't go cheap in manufacturing this front speaker. The casing is heavy and sturdy. It's very well designed and offers crisp sound. All of these wonderful features in one very nice price :)
customer_reviews.author: Enecremw

customer_reviews.title: Great center channel speaker for your sound system.
customer_reviews.text: I am enjoying the great sounds from this speaker, it fills in that missing center if you only have a surround sound system. Perfectly supplies that extra boost for the character talking in a movie.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES

customer_reviews.title: Sounds excellent! spent 400 bucks at best buy on a ...
customer_reviews.text: Sounds excellent ! spent 400 bucks at best buy on a sound bar, it sounded ok took it back got this and a VSX-532 and 2 matching floor speakers could have got by with bookshelf speakers., but for a little more money I got a stereo that no sounder can compete with for the money!
customer_reviews.author: P D

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: This sounds fantastic. It doesn't fit in my existing cabinet, so until I get my TV lifted onto the wall, I have this thing positioned behind my television and it still sounds remarkably better than the Pioneer center channel it was replacing down below. I got that Pioneer in 1999 and I fully expect this one to last as long or longer. I'm using the old one in another room now, and considering getting some front speakers down the road to match this beastly center channel.
customer_reviews.author: K.L. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Great center sound!
customer_reviews.text: Omg this sounds amazing! I'm sure glad I bought this! Amazing center channel sound! Very clear and I can finally hear what I've been missing all these years! You won't be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for my home theater
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to go with the satellite speakers I already bought, so I have a 3.1 setup now. This speaker is exactly what i wanted, the center channel with two side speakers is great for the space I put this in. Sound quality is great on movies and music. I am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan R

customer_reviews.title: Muddy dialog
customer_reviews.text: Bought because previous center channel was not good for speech. This one is just barely better. Get something else for clear dialogue
customer_reviews.author: Eric W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace a Sony center speaker for a "home theater in a box" kit and it improves dialogue immensely. It doesn't destroy sound with bass but produces a clear, crisp sound that is great for an action movie, tv show or even just listening to music. I bought it on sale and have been keeping an eye out for it's matching set to go one sale as well. Comparing to my dad's Onkyo, I would recommend this one and I even like the sound compared to my brother's medium tier polk audio center speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: I don't understand some of the complaints
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid center speaker, better than the Micca MB42X-C.
customer_reviews.author: Maul

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to any one looking for a solid sound in a great priced speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Sound for me is well beyond my expectations. I was just looking to replace my system one component at a time and this was the third speaker from Pioneer. The Center speaker gave my gaming and TV sound a whole new experience. Sounds I never heard before and bass that I thought couldn't get better than what I have. I really like the SP-C22 and would recommend to any one looking for a solid sound in a great priced speaker.
customer_reviews.author: KM

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker but keep its size in mind
customer_reviews.text: I have a Pioneer 5.1 channel receiver, two Sony floorstanders and a Sony subwoofer. This center speaker integrates very well with the Sony speakers and matches their sound almost perfectly. Before buying, make sure this will fit wherever you plan on mounting it. It's about 18" wide, 9" deep and 7" high. I had to buy a new TV stand to accommodate it.
customer_reviews.author: H. Falcon

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and not too pricey
customer_reviews.text: I love what this speaker added to my overall setup. The sound is great I noticed a difference immediately. They do say the center speaker supplies 50% of the total sound.
customer_reviews.author: Rhett

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound at 1/4 of similar spec'd speaker sets!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a package with the rest of the speaker set. Amazing sound for the money. I paired this up with a Denon AVR-S510BT 5.2 channel 4k receiver and it's killing it! Easily out performs similar systems at 1/4 of the price. If you are looking for entry level price but solid over performing sound, this is the set. Highly recommend the Andrew Jones package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awkwardly shaped, good sound
customer_reviews.text: As others say, check the size, it is tall, particularly if you use the feet to angle it up. The sound is good for the price, adding good clarity to voices, but it is a bit directional and you should make sure it's pointing towards your head level.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed, sturdy, and the sound quality is comparable to speakers positioned at a much higher price point.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Awesome center channel for an entry level price!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this center channel based on a fire sale price and wasn't quite sure what to expect. I'm a bit of an audiophile so I was braced for disappointment since the price was so slashed. After using the speakers (along with the matching bookshelf speakers -  I am VERY impressed. The center channel delivers clear audio and a wide frequency response. I continue to be more impressed the more I use my speaker set!
customer_reviews.author: Windy City

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer sounds like well engineered!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what for beginners means other than simple to plug and play. I believe this to be a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and easy to install. Very good voice distinction over other sounds. Just what I needed for a center channel.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Panzardi

customer_reviews.title: what a speaker
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a expensive center speaker but to bassy hard to understand voice. This was half price and better sound. Now I have all the pioneer lineup for 7.1 sound and they all sound great together the price is killer for what u get
customer_reviews.author: Truckdude1

customer_reviews.title: Decent speakers for casual listener
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is good. They're surprisingly large speakers. Make sure you check the dimensions.
customer_reviews.author: LEP

customer_reviews.title: Much more than expected,
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic. Much better than I thought I was getting. Much larger also. Next time I'll check the dimensions. Great center speaker.
customer_reviews.author: PerryP

customer_reviews.title: Buy this speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This cured my center speaker issues. I always had to turn the system up to hear the dialog but when the special effects started had to grab the remote to turn it down. This speaker balanced out perfectly when I used the Audessy mic set up procedure. Now, all is right in the world again.
customer_reviews.author: BSD

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound and value
customer_reviews.text: I added this great sounding center speaker with my ELAC 6.2 speakers. I couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. B

customer_reviews.title: Not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Not good sound, making too noise and hiss noise when you cross 60% volume
customer_reviews.author: AR siddiq

customer_reviews.title: good quality sound
customer_reviews.text: I used this to replace a cheap center channel speaker and i am glad I did. No more looking at my girlfriend and asking "what did they say?". It is larger than I expected but fits behind my TV. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: If you want good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: As a speaker, it works fantastically. If you want good sound quality, this is a great choice, but it is huge. It probably won't fit under your tv, it's probably too heavy to sit on top of your receiver or cable box. If you have the room and quality is your number one requirement, this is a great deal
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Hilinski

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: I'm not an audiophile, and didn't want super expensive or super cheap. These do the job well for my humble home theater.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best entry-level speakers!
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing these, I did my extensive research on speakers. It is hard to beat the price of these speakers. One of the best entry-level speakers for home theater!
customer_reviews.author: Alder

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: An excellent center channel speaker. Voices are clear. Perfect for a small to moderate sized home theater room. Designed by Andrew Jones (formerly of KEF, later Infinity) while he was at Pioneer. The prices on Amazon Prime make the Andrew Jones Pioneer speakers some of the best buys of all time.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Good Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a speaker that was on the smaller end. This is not that speaker although the sound quality is very good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin P Sawejka

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality what an upgrade from my previous JLB ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality what an upgrade from my previous JLB satellite speakers amazing sound for your dollar... great sounding speaker super crisp eith outstanding bass as well
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Easily as good as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I added this to a previously 2.1 system and it made all the difference in the world as far as hearing voices. We used to only listen through the receiver for movies but now we use it for almost all TV due to how much more audible it makes the whole range of sound in programs. I still listen to music on this system in 2.1 mode so I can't comment on it musically.
customer_reviews.author: rh5000

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this complete set with the tall tower speakers and bookshelf ones as well. I couldn't be happier about the sound. If you're okay with wires, and some larger speakers, these are beautiful and decently priced. Slightly bass-heavy, but I have them all near walls and corners so that's to be expected, and I actually prefer a little bit of bass overtone. I've also played some Explosions in the Sky, Postal Service with them, and they respond great to the high notes as well, and they're not even fully broken in yet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds just like the companion tower speakers
customer_reviews.text: If you own Pioneer's tower speakers, SP-FS52, this is the center channel speaker to get. The tonal balance is perfectly matched. The sound quality is astounding for the purchase price.
customer_reviews.author: Roy Y.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great center channel speaker! I will buy the rest of the set starting with the tower speakers next.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Clendenen

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking speaker!  And sounds great on my system!!
customer_reviews.text: Only used this for about a week. So far very happy with this purchase. Speaker produces crisp clear sound. Arrived a day earlier than expected. Looks really nice as a center piece under the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis K

customer_reviews.title: A bit on the large side but it has deep ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit on the large side but it has deep clear sound. I can actually hear lower conversation on movies and TV now.
customer_reviews.author: Rene Collard

customer_reviews.title: A little boxy sounding
customer_reviews.text: A little boxy sounding, Sound is not very transparent. 6 ohm. Good looking speaker and satisfactory addition to my system.
customer_reviews.author: Afterwork Student

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker at a great price. Works well with my older Sansui speakers.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful design.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is good. I like it. It is gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: john demuth

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend. I have been using the Pioneer SP-BS21-LR as fronts for my surround system for a few months and absolutely loved them... Nice, warm tone, smooth crossover and compact design. As she has inherited them, I thought this would make a fine compliment for center speaker. I haven't heard it yet but I have no doubt it will meet my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Doc Brown

customer_reviews.title: A very nice center speaker
customer_reviews.text: I replaced a Klipsch RC3-II with the Pioneer SP-C22 because the Klipsch was too powerful as a surround sound center speaker. The Klipsch, which I'v had for ten years wasn't all that good with dialogue. The Pioneer is a significant step up. It's also not as large, so fits in the TV cabinet we bought for our new Samsung 55" HDTV. I haven't had a chance to play music (except soundtrack music from movies we've watched). I'll update the post once we've had a chance to listen to some music, which is where the Klipsch was very good in out system.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: When I heard them, I knew I wanted them.
customer_reviews.text: These Andrew Jones speakers are awesome. I piece together my set. This center speaker was my last piece I'm extremely satisfied. When I first bought and listen to the bookshelf speakers I knew I wanted to set. I've had them for almost a year and I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: RonDE

customer_reviews.title: I like the price/quality factor of this speaker
customer_reviews.text: Gives watching movies an extra dimension. I like the price/quality factor of this speaker. It is a bit big, but i used a ATS-112 TV Top shelf medium size 12 inch width mount to secure it on my TV
customer_reviews.author: Arif M. Arshad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very Bold Center Speaker!! Use This For My HTD-520 Pioneer In The Mancave (Garage),Just For Tunes. Update: Works Better Now With My Pioneer VSX-830 And A Pioneer Subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: Neon Knight

customer_reviews.title: Sound, especially bass is great
customer_reviews.text: For the price I couldn't be happier. Works well with my existing system as the dialogue is clearer than the speaker i had previously.
customer_reviews.author: jimo

customer_reviews.title: No problem at all with this center speaker. It ...
customer_reviews.text: No problem at all with this center speaker. It was actually bigger that I expected. Big difference from my older Onkyo center speaker that I for about 16yrs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Good
customer_reviews.text: I used it to replace the center speaker on my TV surround sound system.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas J Volzer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Once again, Amazon did not disappoint me with my order. It arrived days before it was expected and double boxed. I was searching for a center channel speaker and began reading reviews on this budget speaker. Let me say this, I am not an audiophile but I enjoy great sound. I do think this speaker can stand up to its own against speakers that are double or even triple in price. I can't think of any downside to this speaker as it was less than $100 when ordered.
customer_reviews.author: Bucknut85

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker
customer_reviews.text: We are using this speaker in a vertical configuration as center, and it does a fine job. Except for PBS shows with heavy Scottish accents with idioms, we don't need to use CC anymore to watch most shows. We were using a cheap center spkr previously and this upgrade made a serious improvement
customer_reviews.author: Marc Brenner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great sounds great! Looks great! 11-11-17 Update after almost 2 years of ownership and it still works just as it should! Very happy with this purchase! BUy it. You will love it!
customer_reviews.author: DynamicReviews

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice sound, big piece of wood, make sure you measure correctly for your space!

customer_reviews.title: Pioneer sp-c22
customer_reviews.text: Provides great sound for television or audio. Easy to hook up.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This is a large speaker, much larger than would be expected from the picture. The size not withstanding, I am very good the performance of this speaker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this is a great center channel speaker. buy one and don't look back. enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers at a wonderful price.
customer_reviews.text: Great center channel speakers from Andrew Jones. These are wonderful for the price at which they are being offered. Great sound quality. Perfect addition for a $1000-$2000 home theater system.
customer_reviews.author: Tuhin Sinha

customer_reviews.title: Great value and sound at this price point really sunrised me.
customer_reviews.text: Got this on a cyber Monday deal with other Andrew jones speakers to build a separate 5.2 system for my family room. Works as expected and I am very impressed with the performance at this price range.
customer_reviews.author: Tory Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker
customer_reviews.text: Awesome front speaker replacement! Much higher quality than the old, small, one it replaced. It is bigger than I was expecting, but fits snugly in my stand. I would also recommend getting their 100w subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: Les

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this center channel!,
customer_reviews.text: Great center channel for the surround sound. Excellent reproduction of all frequencies in the vocal spectrum.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Closser

customer_reviews.title: Good sound. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Purchased with other Andrew Jones speakers. Good sound. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: db

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Great center speaker. I used this to replace by cheap center speaker and the difference is unbelievable. Voice/dialogues are now understandable even on low volume. Kinda little large, but it easily fit a regular size tv stand. absolutely love the speaker. Paired this with my JBL loft50 floorstanding speaker. For $50, what a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: KissimmeePrimeCustomer

product_meta.title: Pioneer SP-C22 Andrew Jones Home Audio Center Channel Speaker
product_meta.description: Pioneer SP-C22 Andrew Jones Home Audio Center Channel Speaker. From speaker designer Andrew Jones comes a collection of speakers that bring professional-quality sound to your living room. This highly-acclaimed speaker delivers on sound, creating an immersive listening experience. The SP-C22 center channel speaker was designed to offer extraordinary performance and remarkable sound quality for music and home theater at an affordable price. FEATURES: Curved-cabinet design reduces standing sound waves inside the cabinet. Twin 4" Woofers and Soft Dome Tweeter. Soft Dome Tweeter. Magnetically Shielded. Frequency Range: 55 Hz-20 kHz.
feature_bullets: ANDREW JONES. From speaker designer Andrew Jones comes a collection of speakers that bring professional-quality sound to your living room. This highly-acclaimed center channel speaker delivers on sound, creating an immersive listening experience.

CURVED DESIGN. This speaker utilizes a true curved cabinet design. Not only aesthetically pleasing, this stiffer design reduces standing sound waves inside the cabinet, resulting in high-performance and exceptional sound quality.

TWEETER. Twin 4" Woofers and Soft Dome Tweeter deliver multi-element crossover to route high frequencies to the Soft Dome Tweeter and low frequencies to the woofer for smooth sound at high volumes. Magnetically Shielded. Frequency Range: 55 Hz-20 kHz.
COMPLEX CROSSOVER. 6 Element Complex Crossover perfectly blends audio between the woofer and tweeter for greater accuracy.
CONNECTION. This speaker is equipped with two rear side wire connections. Requires audio amplifier.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
